# [Fire Alarm and Sensor Monitoring Services](#fire-alarm-and-sensor-monitoring-services)

## Contract Information
* Reference Number: cb-934-77818011
* Solicitation Number: M5000-23-00507/B
* Publication Date: 2024-03-14
* Closing Date and Time for Bid Submissions: April 8, 2024, 16:00
* Regions of Opportunity: Worldwide, with facilities located in Saskatchewan
* Regions of Delivery: Saskatchewan

## Procurement Details
* Procurement Method: Competitive, Open Bidding
* Basis of Selection: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* Tender Status: Cancelled

## Tender Description
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites bids for the provision of Fire Alarm and Sensor Monitoring Services and Fire Alarm Panel Inspection Services for multiple locations in Saskatchewan.

**Contract Period**: The contract will be for two years, with an irrevocable option to extend it for up to three additional one-year periods.

**Security Clearance**: This solicitation contains a security requirement.

## Eligibility Requirements
* The bidder must certify that they qualify as an Indigenous business, as defined under the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB).
* The bidder must comply with all requirements of the PSIB.

## How to Submit Bid Proposals
Please submit your bid proposals to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit as per the instructions provided on page one of the Request for Proposal (RFP).

## Pre-Contractual Requirements
* All contractors must comply with the Integrity Regime, administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada.
* All contractors must register in the Indigenous Business Directory (IBD) to be eligible for federal government contracts that are set-aside for Indigenous businesses.

## Additional Information
For more information, please visit the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) website at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities.
